name: Bus-reservation-system
body:
### TicketReservationSystem *** This is an open source framework for booking ticket . # Setting up the environment *** ### You should have following software install in your machine.
  • Java 7 or above
  • Maven 3 or above
  • Git
  • Any IDE like eclipse
### How to run the application ***
  • Clone the code from repository using git clone
  • Move to the right branch.(currently develop1.0RC) using git checkout develop1.0RC
  • Go inside the TicketReservationSystem folder
  • Clean the workspace using mvn clean
  • Install the maven dependency using mvn install. It'll pull all the dependency
  • Go to booking-site folder run the jetty server (which is embedded currently) using mvn jetty:run
  • type http://localhost:8080/api/bookings . You'll get a response saying Accepted.
### Authors and Contributors Currently we've 3 contributer for this project. And they are
  • sitakant(@cooligc)
  • punya(@punyasmaran)
  • srinu(@srinuk923)
### Support or Contact For any support contact sitakant(@cooligc).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
